mapper.insert: insert into reservation( user_id, user_name, rs_date, rs_start_time, rs_end_time, hp, rs_cate_id, rs_memo ) VALUES ( #{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{rs_date}, #{rs_start_time}, #{rs_end_time}, #{hp}, #{rs_cate_id}, #{rs_memo} )
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d') reg_date, A.*,B.*, if((SELECT rs_cate_name FROM reservation_category WHERE rs_cate_id=B.rs_cate_upper_code) IS NULL, B.rs_cate_name, (SELECT rs_cate_name FROM reservation_category WHERE rs_cate_id=B.rs_cate_upper_code)) AS category1, if((SELECT rs_cate_name FROM reservation_category WHERE rs_cate_id=B.rs_cate_upper_code) IS NULL, NULL, B.rs_cate_name) AS category2 from reservation A left JOIN reservation_category B ON A.rs_cate_id = B.rs_cate_id where 1=1 and A.rs_cate_id = #{rs_cate_id} order by A.rs_date desc

SELECT date_format(A.reg_date,'1') reg_date, A.*,B.*, if((SELECT rs_cate_name FROM reservation_category WHERE rs_cate_id=B.rs_cate_upper_code) IS NULL, B.rs_cate_id, (SELECT rs_cate_id FROM reservation_category WHERE rs_cate_id=B.rs_cate_upper_code)) AS category1, if((SELECT rs_cate_name FROM reservation_category WHERE rs_cate_id=B.rs_cate_upper_code) IS NULL, NULL, B.rs_cate_id) AS category2 from reservation A left JOIN reservation_category B ON A.rs_cate_id = B.rs_cate_id where rs_no=#{rs_no}
mapper.update: update reservation set user_name = #{user_name}, rs_date = #{rs_date}, rs_start_time = #{rs_start_time}, rs_end_time = #{rs_end_time}, hp = #{hp}, rs_cate_id = #{rs_cate_id}, rs_memo = #{rs_memo} where user_id = #{user_id} AND rs_no = #{rs_no}
